section1.title: Hi, I'm Edward!
section1.description: I focus on creating modern interfaces and engaging digital experiences for apps and websites.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I have worked as a Fullstack Developer and UI/UX Engineer for companies in Panama and abroad, including freelance projects. My experience covers building scalable web applications, designing intuitive interfaces, and collaborating with multidisciplinary teams. I have contributed to successful product launches, optimized performance, and mentored junior developers.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: I work with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, GSAP, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Figma, Three.js, and more. I am always learning new tools and frameworks to stay up-to-date with the latest trends in web development and design.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here you can find a selection of my featured projects, including web apps, landing pages, dashboards, and interactive experiences. Each project showcases my skills in frontend, backend, and UI/UX design.

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm Edward Pérez, a Fullstack Developer and UI/UX Engineer based in Panama. I am passionate about technology, problem solving, and creating beautiful and functional digital products. I enjoy teamwork, continuous learning, and sharing knowledge with the community.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, freelance work, or just to say hello! You can contact me via email, LinkedIn, or WhatsApp. I am available for new opportunities and always open to interesting projects.

role: Fullstack Developer specialized in React, TypeScript, and Python
headline: Edward Pérez
description: I am a Fullstack Developer specialized in React, TypeScript, and Python. Passionate about building robust web applications and intuitive user experiences.

about.name: Edward Pérez
about.description: I am a self-taught Fullstack Developer from Panama with experience in web development and UI/UX. I love solving problems in a rational and pragmatic way, always seeking the simplest and most functional solutions.
